name: The Adventures Of Box Frend And Stewpod
name_original: The Adventures Of Box Frend And Stewpod
description:
uh oh! you play as stewpod virhgian while box frend helps you get an egg from a bank you have to steal it!!!

(this project was for the newgrounds july game jam 2021 but im turning it in fuckin late and on gamejolt because ue4 wont export to html5 fuck me)
